analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS score 41 signals a shift to a Neutral regime. Upward momentum pushed the score to 41, driven by a softening DXY (Dollar strength) and stable VIX (Volatility). While liquidity remains flat, rising Gold and widening High-Yield spreads suggest underlying caution. Maintain balanced positions as risk appetite recovers slowly, monitoring for stability above the neutral threshold.

reports.EN: GMS score 41 signals a shift to a Neutral regime. Upward momentum pushed the score to 41, driven by a softening DXY (Dollar strength) and stable VIX (Volatility). While liquidity remains flat, rising Gold and widening High-Yield spreads suggest underlying caution. Maintain balanced positions as risk appetite recovers slowly, monitoring for stability above the neutral threshold.
reports.ES: El GMS de 41 marca el inicio de un rÃ©gimen Neutral. El impulso alcista llevÃ³ el puntaje a 41, apoyado por la debilidad del DXY (DÃ³lar) y la estabilidad del VIX (Volatilidad). Aunque la liquidez es estable, el aumento del Oro y los diferenciales de bonos de alto riesgo sugieren cautela. Mantenga posiciones equilibradas mientras el apetito por el riesgo se recupera gradualmente.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 41 menandakan transisi ke rezim Netral. Momentum mendorong skor ke 41 seiring melemahnya DXY (kekuatan Dolar) dan VIX (Indeks ketakutan) yang stabil. Meskipun likuiditas tetap flat, kenaikan harga Emas dan pelebaran spread High-Yield menunjukkan kewaspadaan pasar. Pertahankan posisi seimbang karena selera risiko mulai pulih secara bertahap dalam fase transisi ini.
